channel.title: need to find a site to get 10 paypal dollars to buy half life on steam
channel.description:
shit,shit,shit i'm 15,don't have a credit card,live in brazil,and want half life,so i figured:yay,paypal can help me *wades through google for paypal cash sites* shit,scam sites :meh: anyone knows a trustable site for me to get 10$,and by that,i mean one with no minimun cashout,i just want 10$ :stuck_out_tongue:
ps: if this is against forum rules i will delete this thread right away,just say it(didn't look against the rules in the faq)

item.title: need to find a site to get 10 paypal dollars to buy half life on steam
item.dc:creator: felipedomaul
item.description:
great news,a guy wants to buy some of my old 360 games,so i’m selling them to him and i’ll buy some games on steam,in package.the valve complete pack makes me :retard:

item.dc:creator: Medevilae
item.description:
felipedomaul:

nah,no need to
if you think it’s unbearable i’ll do a cool photoshop edit right away
opens photoshop

edit:
notice the huge improvement in bearability

I bought Half-Life on it’s birthday a good while back. It went on discount for $.99 USD. If you wait till’ November you could get it cheap. :retard:

item.title: need to find a site to get 10 paypal dollars to buy half life on steam
item.dc:creator: felipedomaul
item.description:
Ramirezoid:

  1. Obtain enough Brazilian Real to equal $10 American

  2. Give money to somebody you know that has a Paypal account

  3. Have them transfer an equal sum of money into your Paypal account

  4. Purchase Half-Life on Steam using money that was transferred to your Paypal account

wow that’s what i might do
just need to find a friend with a credit card

Read full topic

item.title: need to find a site to get 10 paypal dollars to buy half life on steam
item.dc:creator: FireTime
item.description:
Do they have those visa gift cards where you live? because thats what I tell everyone else to do who has no means of purchasing things online. It acts just like a credit card but you pay for it with cash.

Read full topic

item.title: need to find a site to get 10 paypal dollars to buy half life on steam
item.dc:creator: General_Izaac
item.description:
felipedomaul:

shit,shit,shit
i’m 15,don’t have a credit card,live in brazil,and want half life,so i figured:yay,paypal can help me
wades through google for paypal cash sites
shit,scam sites :meh:
anyone knows a trustable site for me to get 10$,and by that,i mean one with no minimun cashout,i just want 10$

ps: if this is against forum rules i will delete this thread right away,just say it(didn’t look against the rules in the faq)

I hope you know that paypal is a service that transfers real USD funds to different bank accounts. these “paypal” dollars is real money. Good luck trying to find a website that will give you 10 dollars.

Read full topic

item.title: need to find a site to get 10 paypal dollars to buy half life on steam
item.dc:creator: felipedomaul
item.description:
ThatsNotPoetry:

It’s time for you to produce your own charity fund. The Buy Felipe Half Life For the Sake of Fine Video Games Everywhere fund. Make a Facebook and Myspace page. Watch it fail, but hope like hell anyway. Post a link to these pages in the signature of every possible gaming forum you can find.

according to my calculator,if every person in the world contributes,each one will need to give 0,00000000125 dollars or 0,000000125 cents
but,as cents are not divisible,each one will have to give 1 cent,which would end up earning me 80 millions dollars :retard:
with that money i can buy half life 8 million times,or gift 7.999.999 copies which supplies 0.1% of the world with half life

maths ftw

Read full topic
